snippet: Texas Tech’s athletic director, Kirby Hocutt, was appointed to the College Football Playoff selection committee.
abstract: Texas Tech University athletic director Kirby Hocutt is appointed to College Football Playoff selection committee; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Texas Tech’s athletic director, Kirby Hocutt, was appointed to the College Football Playoff selection committee.

headline.main: Playoff Committee Adds Texas Tech Athletic Director as Member
